description.value:
You have learned how to master the power contained within sunlight, just like the trees that form your body. Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Sunlight Healing] recovers 1d8 Hit Points per level.

[[/r (@actor.level)d8]]{Sunlight Healing}

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
